label: proof-lem-total-clone-prob-structural-error
proof_text: The structural error is $|E_V_1[P_1,i(V_1) - P_2,i(V_1)]|$. By Jensen's inequality, this is $\leq E_V_1[|P_1,i(V_1) - P_2,i(V_1)|]$. From thm-expected-cloning-action-continuity, the term inside the expectation is bounded by $C_{\text{struct}}^{(Ï€)}(k_1) \cdot n_c$. Since this bound is a deterministic constant, its expectation is the bound itself.
context: Section 16: The Cloning Transition Measure, subsection 15.2.5
